news.title: Gov’t denies claims of single-sourcing affordable housing materials from Devki Group
news.snippet: The government is set to release an additional 1088 units of the affordable housing project to residents of Mukuru slums before the end of the month.

news.title: Building communities: How Kenya's real estate firm commits to corporate social responsibility
news.snippet: In 2024, Willstone Homes Kenya was honoured Best Luxury Project Developer, Best Housing Company of the Year, and Lifelong Achievement in Real Estate.

news.title: Ruto starts make-or-break tour of Gachagua backyard
news.snippet: President William Ruto's tour of Mt Kenya region begins Tuesday, amid mixed feelings among residents and leaders.

news.title: JAMILA'S MEMO: Forced savings or forced suffering?
news.snippet: The government, through Labour Cabinet Secretary Alfred Mutua, has announced plans to introduce a law aimed at encouraging Kenyans to save money — a move...
